title: Riot ripped me off
body:
I was playing a game of aram during the double IP boost
I didn't get double my IP.

I want my IP point - This is not what I agreed to in the terms and conditions
If Riot says double IP, I want all my IP no tricks or scams.

replies.body: im adding that guy on skype and if he doesnt accept ddos 4eva
Umm are you for real, look at the pic properly you did get your Bonus 43 ip which you don't deserve big cry baby
You guys are beyond stupid. OP is making a joke. The correct amount of Double IP would have been 44 whereas he got 43.

And your point is?

Also the correct double IP** is **43, League are just good people and when you are going to earn 43.5 round it up normally.
Riot give this man his 1 IP!

Gee it must feel terrible, not getting your small bonus amount of in game currency, in a free to play game that this company has put tireless hours into making and maintaining. This is IP you are talking about, something you get from every game win or lose. If it was RP, something you spent money on then okay that's understandable why you'd be upset. You didn't get ripped off, you didn't lose any money, they didn't trick or scam you. If this small dilemma has rustled your jimmies that much then send a support ticket in, but I wouldn't even worry about it. 
tldr; it's IP calm down.

Also the next time you post a picture you may want to edit out some of the personal information contained within it as well. just a suggestion.

> Also the next time you post a picture you may want to edit out some of the personal information contained within it as well. just a suggestion.


Or learn to screen shot only league, it's really not that hard.

> Or learn to screen shot only league, it's really not that hard.

Yeah what I was trying to imply. Cut out the other details except for league, or at the very least blur the rest out, in MS paint or something.
Snipping tool works.

> > Or learn to screen shot only league, it's really not that hard.
> 
> Yeah what I was trying to imply. Cut out the other details except for league, or at the very least blur the rest out, in MS paint or something.
> Snipping tool works.

*cough* alt+print screen *cough*

> im adding that guy on skype and if he doesnt accept ddos 4eva

let the baiting commence aye?
